column3: “This ranks in my top 10 list for sure . Hard to come by but if you get the chance a must try. 8.5/10”
“Heavy hitter, recommended for night-time relaxation.  Very cerebral high, quick effects.”
“Get ready to take flight and come back down. Great strain, gives me a good rush of energy for the first hour and then the eyes get heavy and you're good to sit down and relax.”

“Girl Scout Cookies...you have been replaced as my fav strain! DOSE Oil, 1 gram. Fast, heavy hitter, warm fuzzy blanket feeling then soaring euphoria. Long lasting, excellent indica dominant strain. 5 out of 5.”
“Phenomenal balance of physical pain relief, and mental stress relief. Very heady"
column5: and good for day or night use. Fruity
column6: earthy combo of smells...intoxicating. Excellent overall.”"

column3: “Quickly becoming a favorite from Dose here in Seattle. Perfect creative upper for group work and brainstorming. Calming but social and fun high”

“This bud smells like a cabin in a pine Forrest.no kidding. the buds are very very compact and dense high calyx to leaf for sure. The high is very nice and more or less up in nature but not overwhelming as some sativa dominant strains can be.
I give Blue Heron 5 out of 5 stars”

“over all I rate this to be
a very good mind and
body high gave a small apietate and great night rest”

“LOOK: 3/5
-This isn’t by any means the most prettiest flower I’ve came accross – mostly frosty dark green and blue hued popcorn nugs. A bit dry. I might ended up on the very last bits of the batch.

AROMA: 5/5
-A sweet bouquet of lemon/berry with floral earthiness. An unique appealing fragrance who hangs up in the air way long after the jar's lid is cracked - deeply sweet and lemony!

TASTE: 5/5
-Not harsh at all, wh...”
“Me and my friend purchased a ounce from a delivery person. One of the best strains ever smoked, no negatives.”
“Wow love this Strain!! Can be smoked for pain nighttime sleep aid and for just catching a movie with a friend..If you get a chance to taste it do so...”
“this strain has big hard sticky buds with lots of resin”

“my official favorite strain! too keep it short, very relaxing high with a great euphoric head buzz. not increadibly potent but strong. I use this strain for any application. though, it doesn't make me very sleepy for at least a couple of hours.

best use - video gaming”
